item.title: Espressif Systems — Certified Devices
item.description: Espressif Systems is a global leader in wireless communication technologies, consistently pushing the boundaries of IoT innovation. Its portfolio of certified devices showcases a commitment to quality, security, and interoperability across a broad range of IoT solutions.

item.title: Nordic Semiconductor — Certified Devices and Ecosystem
item.description: Nordic Semiconductor is a world-leading provider of ultra-low-power wireless solutions, enabling cutting-edge connectivity across a range of IoT applications. The company’s certified devices and modules power some of the most advanced smart products on the market today.

item.title: NXP Semiconductors — Certified Devices and Solutions
item.description: NXP Semiconductors is a global leader in secure connectivity solutions for the automotive, industrial, and consumer markets. With a focus on sustainability, security, and intelligent systems, NXP enables breakthrough products that power the modern world.

item.title: Renesas Electronics Corporation — Certified Devices and Solutions
item.description: Renesas Electronics Corporation is a global leader in semiconductor solutions, empowering industries with cutting-edge microcontrollers (MCUs), system-on-chips (SoCs), analog, and power devices. Renesas’s comprehensive product portfolio supports a wide range of industries, from automotive and industrial to healthcare and consumer electronics.

item.title: Silicon Labs — Certified Devices and IoT Development Platform
item.description: Silicon Labs is a global leader in secure, intelligent wireless technology, enabling developers to bring innovative IoT solutions to market faster and more reliably. With a focus on integrated hardware, software, and ecosystem support, Silicon Labs empowers developers across smart home, industrial, healthcare, and more.

item.title: Dendo SCM Smart Shade
item.description: Built in collaboration with Dendo. Matter-certified by the Connectivity Standards Alliance. Designed for seamless smart shade automation across platforms.
